thread.title: BRIEF-Circor International - Entered Interest Rate Swap Pursuant To International Swaps And Derivatives Association Master Agreement

title: BRIEF-Circor International - Entered Interest Rate Swap Pursuant To International Swaps And Derivatives Association Master Agreement

organizations.name: nternational swaps and derivatives association master agreement reuters staff

text:
08 AM / Updated 34 minutes ago BRIEF-Circor International - Entered Interest Rate Swap Pursuant To International Swaps And Derivatives Association Master Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - CIRCOR International Inc: 
* CIRCOR INTERNATIONAL - EFFECTIVE APRIL 12, ENTERED INTEREST RATE SWAP PURSUANT TO INTERNATIONAL SWAPS AND DERIVATIVES ASSOCIATION MASTER AGREEMENT 
* CIRCOR SAYS FOUR-YEAR SWAP FIXED NOTIONAL VALUE OF $400.0 MILLION, MATURITY DATE APRIL 12, 2022 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2HEEufx ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
